data.title: Sonaar: Music WordPress Themes for Musicians and Podcasters
data.meta_description: Sonaar provides amazing WordPress themes for musicians, music bands & podcasters looking to create stunning music Websites with WordPress.
data.text:
Premium Music WordPress Themes for Musicians and Podcasters

Join 30 000+ Artists & Music Producers Who Build Their Music Websites with Sonaar

25+ Easy-to-use theme demos available

Stunning audio player with continuous playback

Built for Elementor page builder

Our Music and Podcast WordPress Themes will jumpstart your website as a starting point. — Install with just a single click and you become the creator

Explore

Music Podcast Musician Music Band Entertainment

WordPress

Themes

AWARD-WINNING TEMPLATES

Creative Templates

to Kick/Start.

By using our award-winning creative music wordpress themes and our Podcast WordPress theme designs to kick-start your project, your website will look immersive and professional just like your music.

Designed for you

Sonaar Music WordPress themes are designed for people who wants to focus on music, not on code

Complete

Websites

Sonaar provides complete solutions for both one and multi page websites.

One Click

Install

Install demo’s content with a single click and swap all assets by your own.

Elementor Templates

No coding skills are required to customize and create unique looks!

Multilingual &

Translation-ready

Sonaar allows you to translate your site into your own language.

Dedicated

Technical Support

Our dedicated team will supports you and fix any theme issues you may have.

Automatic

Updates

Enable automatic updates to keep Sonaar safe and get the new features.

INTRODUCING THE BEST MUSIC WORDPRESS THEME

The Future of

Musicians, Music Bands and Podcast WordPress Themes

Don’t waste your time on boring shortcodes. Sonaar VAULT contains more than 100 modular blocks specifically designed for music and band websites. It’s all the things you need to build a unique website in minutes with zero coding.

100+ Content Blocks

Import your favorite blocks with a single click from filterable categories and combine them to create unique looks. Simple yet powerful.

Customizable from A to Z

No coding skills required to customize pre-built content blocks. Sonaar VAULT is fullyintegrated with the visual page builder.

We're not finished yet. Keep Scrolling.

Powerful Extensions

Our themes have been designed to play nice with these WP plugins.

They work seamlessly to extend the capabilities of your site.

Elementor Page Builder

(Free Version)

Stunning AJAX Audio Player

Revolution Slider

Essential Grid

Mailchimp

WooCommerce

Boost your website

Download

48 000 Free Plugins

Elementor Page Builder, Yoast SEO, Anchor, MailChimp, Spotify, SoundCloud & BandCamp players, Paypal, Instagram and Facebook integrations are some of the multiple options you have with WordPress.

Trusted by the

world's best

designers

We are featured

among the best of the best.

Sonaar powers over 21 000 websites across the music and podcasting industry. From Lionel Richie to Napalm Death, our themes are so crazy that they are used by the stellars.
